commit message: Stricter link handling (now checks for the domain name instead of link contains text, Made removing offline subreddits from the Manage History screen work, Other bugfixes
Reordered the subreddits in the offline sidebar to show subscribed subreddits first
Popup if no offline content is found, Fixed opening single comment instance showing cached data
Fixed multireddit crash
Fixed all theme issues regarding editor's EditText fields
Added Manage Offline Content section on all sidebars, Added ability to force an autosync at the current time, Fixed some bugs
Made comments remember their state after being collapsed, Fixed some layout issues, Fixed bugs
Removed EditText style for KitKat and below

Merge pull request #1492 from Nxt3/comments-stuff

Fixed all theme issues regarding editor's EditText fields
Cache the values of last seen (improve scrollign performance)
Made comments since last seen work again
Update version number
Some shadowbox tweaks
Prevent authentication code from leaving user's device
Fixed MainActivity not refreshing when changing multicolumns setting

Merge pull request #1497 from fbis251/authentication_code_fix

Prevent authentication code from leaving user's device

Merge pull request #1503 from Nxt3/better-settings

Fixed MainActivity not refreshing when changing multicolumns setting
Fixed some layout issues, Bug fixes
Externalize strings for Slide Video plugin dialog

Merge pull request #1505 from Nxt3/cleanup

Externalize strings for Slide Video plugin dialog
Fixed some YouTube link handling bugs
Reduced number of calls to Synccit auth by 1

Merge pull request #1506 from Nxt3/cleanup

Reduced number of calls to Synccit auth by 1
Don't uncollapse collapsed comments while doing unhideNumber
Tweaked FAB autohide behavior
Popup suggesting offline mode if trying to open comments without internet
Removed the hidden posts listing (not neccesary and caused RAM issues)
Update version number
